title._content: Image taken from page 327 of '[Qanoon-e-Islan, or the Customs of the Moosulmans of India; comprising a full and exact account of their various rites and ceremonies ... By Jaffur Shurreef. Composed under the direction of, and translated by, G. A. Herklots.

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Qanoon-e-Islan, or the Customs of the Moosulmans of India; comprising a full and exact account of their various rites and ceremonies ... By Jaffur Shurreef. Composed under the direction of, and translated by, G. A. Herklots.]" Contributor: HERKLOTS, Gerhard Andreas. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10056.f.28." Page: 327 Place of Publishing: Madras Date of Publishing: 1863 Edition: Second edition, carefully revised. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001841674 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
